channel.title: Release Notes on Cumulocity IoT Guides
channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes on Cumulocity IoT Guides

item.title: Overview
item.description: These release notes document all relevant changes that have been implemented in a Cumulocity release since the previous release. We distinguish between standard releases and maintenance releases. Standard release A standard release provides new features and functionality as well as improvements and fixes to a previous release.

item.title: Releases 9.25
item.description: Improvements Area Description Zendesk ticket MQTT MQTT-SN gateway which maps MQTT-SN traffic to Cumulocity MQTT SmartRest 2.0 has been added.   CanOpen The CanOpen agent now supports SmartREST 1.

item.title: Releases 9.24
item.description: Improvements Area Description Zendesk ticket UI Global data point explorer performance has been improved. #37347 Fixes Area Description Zendesk ticket UI Text-to-speech functionality is no longer shown in Smart Rules as it is deprecated.

item.title: Releases 9.21 - 9.23
item.description: Improvements Area Description Enterprise Edition SSL management error text improvements. Enterprise Edition The Tenant Statistics page now presents information on microservice usage per tenant.

item.title: Releases 9.17 - 9.19
item.description: Improvements Area Description UI Error message improvements when the password token is expired. Administration An alarm is now raised if data broker cannot connect to the destination tenant.

item.title: Releases 9.13 - 9.15
item.description: Improvements Area Description UI The layout of the Load more button has been improved. Administration

item.title: Release 9.11
item.description: Improvements Area Description Administration It is now possible to limit device count of tenants. The platform administrator can see the peak count of both concurrently registered devices and root devices in the tenant list view and in the CSV export.

item.title: Release 9.10
item.description: Improvements Area Description Administration Email fields are now case insensitive. Enterprise Edition Tenant statistics endpoint has been extended to include tenant URL.

item.title: Release 9.9
item.description: Improvements Area Description UI In addition to the “user name” used to authenticate a user, an administrator can now also specify a “login alias” for a user.

item.title: Release 9.8 (Private Edition)
item.description: What´s new Sigfox agent Cumulocity can now interface with Sigfox devices through the Sigfox Cloud. You can: Provision Sigfox devices easily using the Cumulocity Device Management. Decode upstream payload packets using a web-based user interface.
